title: structReduce
name: structReduce
description:
Iterates over every entry of the given struct and calls the closure with every key/value.
		This function will reduce the struct to a single value and will return this value.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description: function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(any result, string key, object value[, struct struct]):any].

arguments.name: initalValue
arguments.description: inital value passed as part of the first closure call
